CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: After cooling the substrate , a solution of PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) and PCBM ( or PC 70 BM ) mixture ( 1 : 2 w / w ) was spin - coated , where a blend of chloroform and o-dichlorobenzene ( 4 : 1 v / v ) was used as the solvent.

Let's think step by step.

1. PDTP-DTDPP(Bu): This is a material name, specifically a type of polymer.
2. PCBM (or PC 70 BM): This is also a material name, specifically a type of fullerene material.
3. Chloroform: This is a material name, a type of solvent.
4. o-dichlorobenzene: This is another material name, another type of solvent.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. PDTP-DTDPP(Bu): This is a material name, specifically a type of polymer.
2. PCBM (or PC 70 BM): This is a material name, specifically a type of fullerene material.
3. Chloroform: This is a material name, a type of solvent.
4. o-dichlorobenzene: This is a material name, another type of solvent.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PDTP-DTDPP(Bu) |
| PCBM (or PC 70 BM) |
| Chloroform |
| o-dichlorobenzene |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: After cooling the substrate , a solution of PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) and PCBM ( or PC 70 BM ) mixture ( 1 : 2 w / w ) was spin - coated , where a blend of chloroform and o-dichlorobenzene ( 4 : 1 v / v ) was used as the solvent.

Let's think step by step.

1. PDTP-DTDPP(Bu) and PCBM (or PC 70 BM) - These are the names of the specific solutions or mixtures being used. They can be considered as Property Value entities, representing the particular substances with their respective compositions.
2. 1 : 2 w / w - This is the weight ratio of PDTP-DTDPP(Bu) to PCBM in the solution. It can be considered as a Property Value entity, representing the specific weight ratio of the two substances in the mixture.
3. 4 : 1 v / v - This is the volume ratio of chloroform to o-dichlorobenzene in the solvent. It can be considered as a Property Value entity, representing the specific volume ratio of the two solvents used.
